name: World en abyme
description:
A game made over 72hours during the 38th Ludum Dare

World en Abyme is a small 2d puzzle platformer inspired by super monkey ball !The main idea was the mise en abyme: a level in another one in another one in…

Controls:

Use the arrows to move
